result.title: Report on recommendations on innovative, applicable and practical solutions for MCS of unavoidable unwanted catches including high-resolution qPCR assays
result.description: Report on recommendations on innovative, applicable and practical solutions for MCS of unavoidable unwanted catches including high-resolution qPCR assays (Fluidigm BioMark), and application of metabarcoding approach (including MinIon Oxford Nanopore), as well as validation/calibration and development of Standard Operating Procedures for genetic MCS tools

result.title: Impact of the NANoREG II liaisons
result.description: Content: Value of the liaison, synergy potential identified and integrated, acceptance of NANoREG’s SAFE INNOVATION approach and Safe-by-Design concept and recommendations to improve the liaisons.
